import "../../style/pages/user.css" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import { useStore } from "react-redux" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import NameEditor from "../../component/NameEditor" import useToken from "../../utils/useToken" function User () { const store = useStore() const navigate = useNavigate() const token = store.getState().token const userInfo = useToken(token) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { setUser(userInfo) } fetchUser() if (user === "invalid" || token === "") { store.dispatch({type:"setConnected",payload: false}) navigate("/") console.log("invalid user") } },[userInfo]) useEffect (() => {console.log(user) store.dispatch({type:"setFirstname",payload: user.firstName}) store.dispatch({type:"setLastname",payload: user.lastName}) console.log(store.getState().user) },[user]) if (!user) { return (
